oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Birthdays; Packaging; Rocks; Potatoes
World War, 1939-1945 -- Europe, Prisoners of war; Diaries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This page has a piece of light blue paper taped to it that reads, "Happy Birthday 'Mitch' from Room 2." He then writes, "And in the package a potato and a rock." He has drawn a picture of both these items.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mitchener, Hardy A., 1919-1957
